summary: Label printing app using CPCL protocol with barcode alignment issues
architectural_notes: Uses CPCL protocol for label printing
Print output must match on-screen preview exactly
Barcode positioning critical for label fit
known_issues: Barcode not fully fitting on printed label despite preview showing correct positioning

existing_features.title: Adjust CPCL barcode generation parameters in cpclGenerator.ts to ensure barcodes fit completely within the label boundaries when printed using CPCL protocol
Calibrate barcode positioning calculations in cpclLayoutAdjustments.ts to account for CPCL printer coordinate system and ensure printout matches the preview shown in the uploaded photo
Review and adjust barcode width estimation logic for CODE128 barcodes in cpclLayoutAdjustments.ts to accurately calculate barcode dimensions for CPCL protocol output
Update LabelPreview.tsx to accurately represent CPCL printer output so the preview matches actual printed results with correct scaling and positioning
